  • Scalar transport

Scalar transport

This class defines the scalar transport problem, the so-called Advection-Diffusion-Reaction problem

Strong formulation

Define a total computational domian as \(\Omega\) and the Dirichlet and Neumann boundaries \(\Gamma_D\) and \(\Gamma_N\) where \(\Gamma_D \cup \Gamma_D = \partial\Omega\) and \(\Gamma_D \cap \Gamma_D = 0\). Let the trial function space be defined s

\[\begin{split}\vec{u}\cdot\nabla c = D\nabla^2c + R \\\end{split}\]

where \(c\) is the concentration field, \(\vec{u}\) is the velocity, \(D\) is diffusivity, and \(R\) is the reaction.

Boundary conditions

Fixed value boundary condition

\[c = c_D \; \forall \vec{x} \in \Gamma_D\]

Diffusive flux boundary condition

\[\nabla c \cdot \hat{n} = \vec{h} \cdot \hat{n} \; \forall \vec{x} \in \Gamma_N\]

where \(\hat{n}\) is the unit normal to \(\Gamma_N\)

Weak formulation

The weak formulation is stated as follows:

\[C := \{c \in H^1(\Omega) | c = c_D \;\text{on}\; \Gamma_D\}\]

and the corresponding test function

\[W := \{w \in H^1(\Omega) | w = 0 \;\text{on}\; \Gamma_D\}\]

The weak formulation, for \(c \in C\) and \(w \in W\)

\[0 = \left(w, \vec{u}\cdot\nabla c\right)_\Omega + \left( \nabla w, D\nabla c \right)_\Omega - \left(w, R\right)_\Omega - \left(w, \vec{h}\cdot \hat{n}\right)_{\Gamma_n} + \sum_{\Omega_e} \int_{\Omega_e} \tau \mathcal{R} \left(\vec{u} \cdot \nabla w \right) d\Omega\]

where ther residue \(\mathcal{R}\) is

\[\mathcal{R} = \vec{u} \cdot \nabla c - D\nabla^2c - R\]

where \(\mathcal{S}\) is the stabilization term for advection dominated problem [1]. There are three types of \(\tau\) that the code provides. These are the shakib, su, codina type. For given a cell diameter \(h\), a cell Peclet number \(Pe_h=\frac{\lvert \vec{u} \rvert h}{2D}\)

Stabilization parameters

Stabilization parameters \(\tau\) are predefined values adapted from [1] via the get_stab_constant(tau_type) method. The tau_type parameter can be either shakib, su, or codina, and are defined as

\[\begin{split}\tau_{shakib} = \left( \left( \frac{2\lvert \vec{u} \rvert^2}{h}\right)^2 + 9*\left(\frac{4D}{h}\right)^2 + R^2 \right)^{-0.5} \\\end{split}\]
\[\begin{split}\tau_{su} = \frac{h}{2 \lvert \vec{u} \rvert} \left( coth(Pe_h) - \frac{1}{Pe_h}\right) \\\end{split}\]
\[\begin{split}\tau_{codina} = \frac{h}{2 \lvert \vec{u} \rvert} \left(1 + \frac{1}{Pe_h} + \frac{hR}{2\lvert \vec{u} \rvert}\right)^{-1} \\\end{split}\]
